About the Company: Phillips Carbon Black Ltd is the largest manufacturer and supplier of carbon black in the country catering to the needs of elastomer, plastic, paints and ink manufacturing industries.They also manufacture Special Black for non-rubber applications.The company designs, manufacturers and markets carbon black. The major market for Carbon Black is Tyre Industry. Carbon Black is also required by Non-Tyre rubber based application industry as well as the plastic industry.PCBL has capability & flexibility to produce any ASTM grade.Besides ASTM grades, PCBL also manufactures customized product specific to a customer..The company also engagged in the business of Power, Carbon Black.
